#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(OpenCV2Demo)

SET(CMAKE_SYSROOT "C:/SysGCC/Raspberry/arm-linux-gnueabihf/usr/local/lib")
set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "C:/SysGCC/Raspberry/arm-linux-gnueabihf/sysroot/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf")
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES )

add_executable(OpenCV2Demo OpenCV2Demo.cpp)


set(OpenCV_STATIC ON)
set(OpenCV_CUDA OFF)
set(OpenCV_DIR "C:/SysGCC/Raspberry/arm-linux-gnueabihf/sysroot/usr/shared/opencv2/share/OpenCV")

find_package(OpenCV REQUIRED)
target_link_libraries(OpenCV2Demo ${OpenCV_LIBS} "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
